title: Prism Calculator (Volume & Surface Area) - Rectangular & Triangular | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: LSA = P \cdot L \quad (\text{where } P \text{ is the perimeter of the base})
formulas.raw: LSA = P \cdot L \quad (\text{where } P \text{ is the perimeter of the base})

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Lateral Surface Area ($LSA$): $$LSA = P \cdot L \quad (\text{where } P \text{ is the perimeter of the base})$$ Total Surface Area ($TSA$): $$TSA = LSA + 2B = P \cdot L + 2B$$
